entities.description: Use of stimulant prescription drugs by the respondent.
Behavioral issues respondents might face after using stimulants, such as causing arguments with family or friends.
Increased chances of getting physically hurt while using stimulant prescription drugs.
Symptoms experienced after stopping or using less stimulant prescription drugs.
Feeling blue or down after using less or stopping stimulant prescription drugs.
Feeling tired or exhausted after using less or stopping stimulant prescription drugs.

relationships.description: Relates the use of stimulant prescription drugs to causing behavioral issues such as arguments with family or friends.
Relates the use of stimulant prescription drugs to an increase in chances of getting physically hurt.
Relates the use of stimulant prescription drugs to experiencing withdrawal symptoms when usage is reduced or stopped.
Defines feeling blue or down as a withdrawal symptom of reducing or stopping stimulant prescription drugs.
Defines feeling tired or exhausted as a withdrawal symptom of reducing or stopping stimulant prescription drugs.
